mapper.select:
select fh.id as frontHtmlId from front_html fh
fh.html_type = 2
and fh.id < #{id} and exists (SELECT f.html_keyword from front_html f where f.id=#{id} AND f.html_keyword = fh.html_keyword)
and fh.id > #{id} and exists (SELECT f.html_keyword from front_html f where f.id=#{id} AND f.html_keyword = fh.html_keyword)
ORDER BY fh.id desc
limit 1
